Helper: Build tidy XY (Harvest/Escapement) 50-yr summaries with quantiles

Source: R/make_Kusko_figure_D.R
dot-make_50yr_xy_tidy.Rd

Converts the output of .summarize_50_year_avg() into a tidy data frame that includes central points (means or medians) and quantile ranges (q10, q25, q50, q75, q90) for Harvest and Escapement, joined with standardized scenario metadata.

Usage

.make_50yr_xy_tidy(summary_list, scen_df, statistic = "mean")

Arguments

summary_list

Output from .summarize_50_year_avg().

scen_df

Scenario metadata tibble (with scen column).

statistic

Which statistic for the point estimate: "mean" or "median".

Value

Tidy dataframe (one row per scenario) with columns: mgmt, selectivity, trends, factorMSY, scen, and esc_mean, esc_q10, esc_q25, esc_q50, esc_q75, esc_q90, harv_mean, harv_q10, harv_q25, harv_q50, harv_q75, harv_q90.
